short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep you organization safe and secure.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Segra aids employees in maintaining secure work practices. This extension identifies potential security risks and provides guidance for enhancing your organization's security.

It assists you in:
- Warn users in your organization if their password is weak
- Notify, if the users is using websites that is against your organization
- Identify the users that is not using organization email

This extension guarantees that it will not:
- Monitor your web browsing behavior
- Collect any information related to personal email addresses
- Transmit any private information or passwords

Please note! Segra does not function independently. To use this extension, you must follow the invitation link provided by your company administrator from segra.io
